Changes since your last statement are shown using green up arrows for increases and red down arrows for decreases. The changes are calculated in chronological order, which may not match the order in which statements have been issued.

Changes shown in printed statements may change. Your digital statement will always show the most accurate figures.

Rounding differences in your calculations

The values in this statement may not add up precisely to the totals provided due to rounding. The calculation of your funding is done using exact figures.

Total Maintained special schools funding
Maintained special schools funding Sub-total
Student financial support funding - Maintained special schools £11,345
More about maintained special schools funding

This funding is aggregated and paid as a lump sum. Local Authorities should distribute it across all maintained special schools, according to need.
